Texts.Eng:
Alicorns are the curious combination of Earth Ponies, Unicorns and Pegasi, known to be deities in equine folklore. While they're theoretically the strongest, practically it mostly relays to their innate charismatic abilities and diverse skills among the board.

  ^orange;Diet^reset;: Herbivore

^orange;Perks^reset;:
  +^green;10^reset;% Charisma. Health x^green;1.05^reset;, +^green;7^reset;% E. Regen, Fall Damage x^green;0.7^reset;
  ^cyan;Immune^reset;: Aether
  ^cyan;Racial Ability^cyan;: Earth Pony Stomp, Unicorn Glow, Pegasus Flight

^orange;Environment^reset;:
  Aether and Crystalline: Energy x^green;1.05^reset;, Health x^green;1.1^reset;, +^green;20^reset;% E. Regen

^orange;Weapons^reset;:
  +^green;15^reset;% Staff, Broadsword and Assault Rifle Mastery

^orange;Weaknesses^reset;:
  ^red;Requires twice as much food to sustain themselves^reset;, +^red;60%^reset; Energy Block time.

^orange;Resistances^reset;:
  -^red;25^reset;% Physical and Knockback, +^green;15^reset;% Cosmic and Shadow.
